Que dire ?
On dit que les suites, c'est uniquement pour faire de nouveau tourner la machine à billet (la plupart des niveaux ou des idées ayant déjà été créé et les coûts sont proche de zéro = bénéfices !). 
Ici, ce jeu prend toute les bonnes idées de PORTAL (et franchement il y avait que de bonnes idées) et les améliore jusqu'à devenir un jeu à la limite du "PERFECT".  
Ce jeu contient tout ce qu'il faut pour garder le joueur jusqu'au bout de la nuit (comme le faisait son ainé) et nous permet de rentrer dans le monde toujours plus immense de la société APERTURE. 
De plus le fait de devoir faire appel à de nouvelle façon de résoudre les niveaux (liquide bleu, orange) est tout simplement très ingénieux. 
Et sans spoiler la fin, elle ouvre la possibilité d'un troisième opus que les fan attendent depuis que trop longtemps ! 
Tout ça fait que PORTAL 2 est le meilleur jeu de ce début du XXième siècle.

Mind bendingly awesome game, nuff said.

One of the games you can always come back to anytime and have fun again. The concept, the playthrough, the story, the jokes - all of it without forcing you to give your precious life energy, only forcing you to think a little sometimes to solve various puzzles.  But you want to do it anyway. And oh boy, the co-op umltiplayer is awesome. Just squash your friend whenever you can.

Increíble manera de expandir el universo Portal con esta secuela. Con excelentes nuevas mecánicas y una gran historia detrás, Portal 2 logra encandilar desde el inicio con personajes muy carismáticos que te servirán de compañía durante el recorrido en los bien diseñados puzzles que se nos presentan. Después de 5 años luce igual de genial como la primera vez. Excelente juego.

Played portal, thought it was great. Waited too long to play Portal 2. Enjoyed the new puzzles. Thought the gel puzzles were a nice new challenge. The dialogue and story were also a good addition. And wheatly is obnoxious.

Одна из лучших игр, сделанных компанией Valve. В ней идеально практически все - геймплей, дизайн уровней, звуковая составляющая и конечно же характеры персонажей. ГЛаДОС по праву занимает свое 12 место в списке 50 величайших персонажей компьютерных игр. 10/10, вы многое потеряли, если до сих пор не поиграли в эту игру.

Portal 2 is one of those games that even though it was released over 5 years ago, is still an entertaining game that stands against the test of time. The puzzles are challenging but beatable, the characters are witty and memorable and the gameplay is very smooth. A great game I will always recommend.

When life gives you lemons,..........don’t make lemonade!
Make life take the lemons back! Get mad! I don’t want your damn lemons, what the hell am I supposed to do with these? Demand to see life’s manager! Make life rue the day it thought it could give Cave Johnson lemons! Do you know who I am? I’m the man who’s gonna burn your house down! With the lemons! I’m gonna get my engineers to invent a combustible lemon that burns your house down!

This is such a great expansion on the ideas of the first game. Not a ton of replay value, but a really great story and play mechanics that still make it one of my favorites.

The game itself is fantastic, which should be no surprise, but what you might not realize is the near-infinite replay value that comes from the community-created test chambers. Every few months I can revisit this game for a few nights with a friend and chew through a queue of 20-30 top rated co-op chambers. For years now we've been able to do this. Absolutely worth every penny.
想象丰富，虽然简简单单的两道传送门，但是却有无限可能

Эталонное сочетание головоломки и истории рассказанной через окружающий мир. Нечто похожее есть в The Talos Principle, но Portal 2 выше на две головы по части атмосферности.

This is a really funny game! The dialogue and co-op is awesome, and you feel like aquiring something when you get through the levels!

I really liked the first game, so naturally I bought the second game! I do not regret purchasing this game. I love the characters, especially Wheatley. The puzzles are great, they get more challenging as you go along and that's the best part of the game. I even like the two-player part of the game, my sister and I play it together all of the time. It gets frustrating sometimes because you can only see one part of the puzzle but that means you really have to work with your partner! I definitely nominated this game for the "Test of Time" award because it is a game you can keep coming back to. I highly recommend this game to all puzzle lovers.
